description: This refers to situations where a customer has paid their EMI through one mode (e.g., UPI), but an additional EMI is also debited via auto-debit (NACH), resulting in an excess payment. The customer seeks a refund for the duplicate amount debited.
examples: I paid the EMI via UPI today morning but NACH still deducted another EMI. Please refund.
My account was debited twice for the same EMI. Need a refund.

description: The customer wants to close their loan account by paying the entire outstanding principal and interest in a single lump sum, earlier than the scheduled tenure. They may also ask about foreclosure charges or the procedure.
examples: I want to foreclose my loan. Please share the final amount.
What is the process and charges for closing the loan early?

description: The customer made a payment before the EMI due date and is either confirming whether it has been adjusted properly or wants it to be applied toward the upcoming installment.
examples: I made an advance EMI payment. Please confirm it's adjusted.
Paid before due date. Will it reflect for this month's EMI?

description: Customer has made a payment, but it's not visible in their loan account, dashboard, or statements. The customer is worried the payment may not have been received.
examples: I made payment but it’s not showing on my account.
Payment is successful from bank side but not updated in your app.

description: Request from a customer to change the EMI due date to a different day of the month, often for convenience or alignment with salary dates.
examples: Can I change my EMI date to the 5th instead of 1st?
I want my EMI to be deducted after my salary is credited.

description: Problems related to the EMI payment link such as non-functioning URLs, expired links, or redirection failures during payment.
examples: Payment link not opening.
I tried to pay but the link is expired or invalid.

description: Customer requests for EMI history, outstanding dues, or financial statements such as amortization schedules or repayment summaries.
examples: Please send me a statement of all EMIs paid.
I want the repayment schedule for my loan.

description: Customer made an EMI payment ahead of time but later changed their mind and wants that advance payment refunded.
examples: I paid EMI in advance but want a refund now.
Please refund the advance amount as I’ve paid again.

description: Customer is asking for available payment methods such as UPI, Netbanking, Debit card, or direct link options.
examples: How can I make the EMI payment?
Is UPI available for loan repayment?

description: Customer is unable to make their EMI due to personal, financial, or technical issues and may request help or alternate options.
examples: I lost my job and cannot pay this month’s EMI.
App not working. Unable to pay EMI today.

description: Customer has initiated or is asking about initiating a chargeback with their bank due to failed service or duplicate debit.
examples: I raised a chargeback because payment was taken twice.
Bank reversed the EMI. Do I still need to pay?

description: Customer requests waiver of late payment charges due to personal or technical reasons, claiming the delay was unintentional or unavoidable.
examples: Please remove penalty charges for this EMI. I paid late due to app issue.
Waive off the late fee. I had no funds on the due date.

description: The customer finds incorrect or disputed entries on their credit report due to loan reporting errors and wants corrections.
examples: My CIBIL report shows incorrect EMI data. Please update.
There is a dispute in my credit report because of this loan.

description: Request for an official No Dues Certificate after loan completion or foreclosure confirming no outstanding balance.
examples: Please issue my NOC/NDC as I’ve paid the loan fully.
I need the No Dues Certificate for my records.

description: Customer wants to pause or freeze their loan account temporarily, typically due to medical or financial reasons.
examples: Can you suspend my account for 2 months due to health issues?
Requesting temporary suspension of EMIs.

description: Customer requests permanent closure or deletion of their loan or app account after fulfilling obligations.
examples: I want to close my loan account permanently.
Delete my account from your system.

description: Customer wants a detailed statement of transactions related to their loan, including disbursement and repayment history.
examples: Please provide the Statement of Account for my loan.
I need complete loan transaction details.

description: Customer is unable to log into the app or web portal, often due to password, phone number, or OTP-related issues.
examples: I can’t log into the app. It shows an error.
Not receiving OTP. Unable to access my account.

description: Customer wants to update personal details such as phone number, email, address, or bank account info.
examples: I want to update my mobile number in your records.
Change my bank account details for EMI.

description: Customer is facing technical issues uploading KYC or other required documents through the app or website.
examples: Document upload fails every time. Please help.
Unable to upload PAN and Aadhaar.

description: Customer is requesting permanent deletion of their personal data from the company's systems for privacy reasons.
examples: Please delete all my personal data from your servers.
I want to remove my data as per privacy policy.

description: Customer complains about threatening, repeated, or abusive calls/messages from recovery or collection agents.
examples: I’m receiving harassing calls for EMI. Please stop.
Agent threatened me over a missed EMI.

description: Customer disputes the total overdue amount shown in their account or claims they’ve already paid.
examples: My dashboard shows wrong amount due.
I already paid, but it shows pending EMI.

description: Customer requests an extension on due dates or additional time to pay due to financial difficulty.
examples: Can I get 10 extra days to pay the EMI?
I need a grace period for this month's payment.

description: Customer wants to negotiate a one-time settlement for reduced repayment instead of paying full dues.
examples: I want to settle my dues with a lump sum.
Can I get a discount on the total outstanding?

description: Customer has received or is worried about receiving legal notices regarding unpaid dues and seeks clarification.
examples: I got a legal notice. Please explain the issue.
Will I face legal action if I miss this EMI?

description: Complaints regarding inappropriate, aggressive, or unethical behavior by field recovery agents.
examples: Your agent behaved badly and shouted at me.
Agent came to my house and created a scene.

description: Customer wants to know the current status of their submitted loan application, whether it's under review, pending, or rejected.
examples: What is the status of my loan application?
I applied last week but haven't received an update.

description: Customer wants to know if their application is waitlisted and when it might be processed.
examples: Am I on the waitlist for loan approval?
What does waitlisted mean in my application?

description: Customer wants a detailed explanation for why their loan was rejected.
examples: Why was my loan application rejected?
Please tell me the reason for rejection.

description: Customer wants to know if and when they can reapply after a loan rejection.
examples: Can I reapply for a loan again?
How long should I wait before reapplying?

description: Loan application was rejected because of problems with submitted documents like mismatch, unclear scans, or expiry.
examples: My loan was rejected due to document failure.
Which document caused the rejection?

description: Customer wants to understand the income, employment, credit score, or location criteria needed to be eligible for a loan.
examples: What is the minimum salary required for loan?
Am I eligible for a loan with my credit score?

description: Customer wants to transfer their existing loan to another lender and seeks information on the procedure.
examples: How can I transfer my loan to another bank?
Please explain the balance transfer process.

description: Customer wants to know the current status of their loan transfer request.
examples: What's the status of my loan transfer?
Has my loan been transferred yet?

description: Customer is asking what documents are needed for initiating or completing a loan balance transfer.
examples: What documents do I need for loan transfer?
Is PAN and NOC enough for transfer?

description: Customer wants to know if there are any charges or fees for transferring their loan to another institution.
examples: Is there any charge for loan transfer?
How much is the foreclosure and transfer fee?

description: Customer wants to know how to close their current loan as part of a transfer or foreclosure.
examples: How do I close my existing loan before transfer?
I want to close this loan and move to another lender.

description: Customer wants to set up automatic EMI payments via e-mandate/NACH from their bank account.
examples: How to register for auto-debit EMI?
Please help me set up NACH mandate.

description: Auto-debit failed due to technical issues or registration failure. Customer is seeking help or retry options.
examples: My auto-debit failed. EMI was not deducted.
Mandate setup failed. Please assist.

description: Customer wants to update or change their mandate details such as bank account or EMI amount.
examples: I want to change the account linked to mandate.
Can I modify my auto-debit instructions?

description: Request to stop or cancel auto-debit instructions permanently or temporarily.
examples: Cancel my mandate registration.
I want to disable auto-debit for now.

description: Customer faces problems in completing NACH or eNACH setup for EMI payments.
examples: I am not able to set up NACH from my bank.
eNACH link not working during registration.

description: General queries about EMI auto-debit process, consent status, or verification of authorization.
examples: Have I authorized auto-debit?
Is auto-debit active on my account?

description: Customer is unable to schedule a VKYC session or wants to change the scheduled time.
examples: I missed my VKYC slot. Please reschedule.
Unable to book time for VKYC.

description: Customer is facing issues such as poor video quality, disconnections, or device errors during VKYC.
examples: Camera not working during VKYC.
I was disconnected during the KYC call.

description: Problems during VKYC session where documents are unclear, expired, or not accepted.
examples: My Aadhaar wasn’t accepted during VKYC.
Documents not verified in VKYC session.

description: Customer wants to understand why their VKYC was rejected or failed.
examples: Why did my VKYC get rejected?
Reason for failure of VKYC?

description: Customer wants to change or re-book their VKYC appointment.
examples: Please help me reschedule my VKYC.
I missed my call. Want to try again.

description: Customer is unsure if their identity has been correctly verified via VKYC or has follow-up concerns.
examples: Is my VKYC verification complete?
My name was spelled wrong in VKYC. Please correct.

description: Customer wants details about the loan products available, eligibility, or features.
examples: What types of loans do you offer?
Is there a personal loan for salaried employees?

description: Questions about applicable interest rates, floating/fixed rates, or rate changes.
examples: What is the current interest rate?
Can I reduce my loan rate?

description: Customer is asking about discounts, cashback, or any ongoing offers on loans.
examples: Do you have any festival offer on loan?
I saw a discount on your website. Is it still valid?

description: Issues while using the mobile app or website such as crashes, slow loading, or unresponsive buttons.
examples: App crashes every time I open it.
Payment button not responding on website.

description: Customer wants to provide non-critical feedback, reviews, or suggestions for service improvement.
examples: Your support team was very helpful.
I have a suggestion to improve the app.

description: External parties (e.g., agents or partners) reaching out for B2B tie-ups, partnerships, or affiliate collaboration.
examples: I want to become your loan distribution partner.
Do you have a referral or reseller program?

description: Complaints that don't clearly fall under any specific category or involve multiple overlapping issues.
examples: No one is responding to my email or calls.
Too many issues in my account. Please call back.
